::Zardus/DeathStorm::

Zardus nods, putting away his laser. "Agreed, Nemesis."

He opens a channel to the other bots of the alliance.

"All alliance members, meet me and Nemesis at the coordinates of the new predacon ship."

"Ok, let's go." He says to Nemesis and flies out of the cave.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm growls as he recieves Zardus' orders. He flies out of the alliance base, grumbling to himself.
